restaurant_info.name: Abu Al Khair Restaurant
restaurant_info.description: Authentic Middle Eastern cuisine with traditional recipes passed down through generations
restaurant_info.address: 123 Main Street, Downtown District, City Center

menu.name: Chicken Shawarma
menu.description: Tender marinated chicken wrapped in fresh pita bread with garlic sauce and vegetables

menu.name: Beef Kabab
menu.description: Grilled beef skewers seasoned with traditional Middle Eastern spices

menu.name: Hummus with Pita
menu.description: Creamy chickpea dip served with warm pita bread and olive oil drizzle

menu.name: Tabbouleh Salad
menu.description: Fresh parsley salad with tomatoes, mint, onions and bulgur in lemon dressing

menu.name: Mixed Grill Platter
menu.description: Combination of chicken, beef kabab and kofta served with rice and grilled vegetables

menu.name: Baklava
menu.description: Traditional sweet pastry made with phyllo dough, honey and pistachios

menu.name: Fresh Mint Lemonade
menu.description: Refreshing drink made with fresh mint leaves, lemon juice and sparkling water

menu.name: Falafel Plate
menu.description: Crispy chickpea fritters served with tahini sauce and pickled vegetables
